name: Orders with incorrect refund
description: When a refund must be performed on your website, the user wishes to receive the correct amount back. Refund must be equal either to your Transaction revenue or to your Product revenue. An incorrect refund can mean a decrease of ROI.

constants.name: permittedRefundDeviation
constants.description: level above which deviations are considered to be incorrect and not due to rounding of numbers

blocks.description: Loads data and checks for presence of refund data
Test checks, if refund amount is equal to value of product revenue/total revenue. If not, it fails.
blocks.passMessage: No transactions with incorrect refund amount were found (refund amount is equal to value of product revenue/total revenue).
blocks.failMessage: Transactions with incorrect refund amount were found.
blocks.failHowtofix: Check the correctness of the refund measurement.
blocks.failTableDescribe: Sample of up to 10 invalid transactions:
